captions.text: Yeeahhhh here we go, finally shredding again!
Let's check out the coal mine!
Ey, this is the craziest winch spot I've ever seen.
And we are going to shred it!
Man, why do I even deserve this?
I wanted to spin another 180 degrees
but my shoulder was too far ahead
and then I hit the ground.
Of course I'm going to shred again!
At night, you seem to wakeboard a lot faster

title: Wakeboarding at a Coal Mine - Red Bull Secret Spot
